channel.title: Components on Akhil Simha
channel.description: Recent content in Components on Akhil Simha

item.title: ESP32 Parts - Not the real one!
item.description: And yet again, I decided to order components from AliExpress with the least hope of finding a real ESP32 by Espressif, but as expected it was an ESP32 looking clone.

item.title: Logic Analyzer
item.description: Introduction: As an embedded engineer, a reliable logic analyzer is an essential tool for debugging and troubleshooting projects.
